Item.sqlserver_body: /* name: lifecycle_state_id.xml created: 28-MAR-2003 George J. Carrette, for Army WVA project. purpose: to support item creation from sql code. */ create function innovator.lifecycle_state_id(@MAP_NAME VARCHAR(32), @STATE_NAME VARCHAR(32)) RETURNS CHAR(32) AS BEGIN RETURN( SELECT LIFE_CYCLE_STATE.ID FROM LIFE_CYCLE_STATE,LIFE_CYCLE_MAP WHERE LIFE_CYCLE_STATE.NAME = @STATE_NAME AND LIFE_CYCLE_MAP.NAME = @MAP_NAME AND LIFE_CYCLE_MAP.ID = LIFE_CYCLE_STATE.SOURCE_ID ) END
Item.name: lifecycle_state_id
